SENT.plain: We prospectively investigated 131 consecutive cases (both in- and outpatients) of suspected dementia to evaluate the relative frequency of different types of dementia in Chinese patients
In contrast to the Western series, vascular dementia (39.1%) was slightly more frequent than the Alzheimer's disease (36.4%)
Twelve cases (10.9%) of potentially treatable dementia were found
Careful clinical observation was the most useful part of the evaluation
CT scan of brain was the most useful laboratory test
